item.title: How To Cite
item.description: If you use or want to refer to SeisSol please cite the following primary references: Alice-Agnes Gabriel, Vikas Kurapati, Zihua Niu, Nico Schliwa, David Schneller, Thomas Ulrich, Ravil Dorozhinskii, Lukas Krenz, Carsten Uphoff, Sebastian Wolf, Alexander Breuer, Alexander Heinecke, Christian Pelties, Sebastian Rettenberger, Stephanie Wollherr, and Michael Bader (2025). SeisSol. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.15685917 Example: “We use the open-source software SeisSol v1.3.2 (Gabriel et al., 2025)”. Secondary references Please also check the SeisSol Google Scholar profile.
